postBodyContent: I’ve been researching ways to raise morale, and I found an interesting article in a scientific journal.

I love how Angel is not-so-subtly jealous in this scene and is just casually leaning against the stairwell while Buffy clearly interacts with this boy…and the clearly awkward vibes after Owen reappears in this scene.
That might not be important to you, but it is important to me. All of them, they all think that you’re a monster. But I know that you’re not, you’re not! You sure about that?

Okay but that’s a fucking perfect Lightsaber Form VI stance right there, one-hand grip on the blade, off-hand folded across the chest so he could Force out AND deflect in one movement, that’s fucking Niman, the Way of the Rancor, goddamnit Kylo Ren

As I leave this earth and sail into the infinite cosmic universe, the wars, the triumphs, the beauty, and the bloodshed, the ocean of human endeavor, it all grows quiet, insignificant. I’m nothing more than recycled stardust and borrowed energy, born from a rock, spinning in the ether.
does it ever just hit you, that your friends probably have a better time without you there. because I think about that a lot.

Buffy/Angel Appreciation Week | Day 7: Free day » Everyone discussing the importance of their relationship

To be able to find the one person in all dimensions that I was meant to be with, and have everything work out exactly as I dreamed. I mean, how often does the universe allow that to happen?

So I told him that I never really liked his friends
Now he’s gone and he’s calling me a bitch again
